description: GardenerAdmissionController contains the configuration of the Gardener Admission Controller

componentConfiguration.description: ComponentConfiguration contains the component configuration of the Gardener API Server

deploymentConfiguration.description: DeploymentConfiguration contains optional configurations for the deployment of the Gardener Admission Controller

enabled.description: Enabled configures whether the Gardener Admission Controller should be deployed

seedRestriction.description: SeedRestriction configures the SeedRestriction admission plugin
